character.statement: The hammer holds great power. Heed my wisdom and I will lead you on the path to becoming a Master Creator.

exchange.question: Who are you?
exchange.answer: I am the Master Creator who built the walls of Asgard.

exchange.question: Where am I?
exchange.answer: You have entered the ancient realm of Asgard. There are an infinite number of realms to explore.

exchange.question: What should I do?
exchange.answer: Wield the power of the hammer to explore, destroy, and create.
